open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Provision for children and young people

description: Demolition of existing building and the erection of a part-5, part-8 storey building to provide 2 mixed use (Classes A1, A2, A3, A5, B1(a) and D2) units on the ground floor with 41 residential dwellings above, cycle and bin storage, disabled parking and a secured communal courtyard.
